price: 一体、私たちを差しおいて、彼の上に教訓（啓示）が下されたと？いや、彼は大噓つきで自惚れ屋だ」。
arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: a-ul'qiya al-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhābun ashirun
